thread.title: Arsene Wenger ready to hand Mathieu Debuchy an Arsenal recall in FA Cup clash with Sutton United
thread.title_full: Arsene Wenger ready to hand Mathieu Debuchy an Arsenal recall in FA Cup clash with Sutton United

author: John Cross
title: Arsene Wenger ready to hand Mathieu Debuchy an Arsenal recall in FA Cup clash with Sutton United
text:
Arsene Wenger ready to hand Mathieu Debuchy an Arsenal recall in FA Cup clash with Sutton United The French defender has played only 16 minutes in the Premier League so far this season Share Debuchy could be about to come in from the cold (Photo: Arsenal FC via Getty Images) Share Get Arsenal FC   
Mathieu Debuchy could be ready for an Arsenal comeback in the FA Cup at Sutton United. 
France full back Debuchy, 31, has been out in the cold since suffering a hamstring injury in November but is back in training and could play on Monday night. 
Arsenal were willing to let Debuchy go in January after an outspoken attack on Arsene Wenger but it seems he could get a reprieve. 
It shows that Arsenal boss Wenger is ready to use a mix and match line-up of youth and experience with the likes of Danny Welbeck and Mohamed Elneny together with youngsters Jeff Reine-Adelaide and Rob Holding. Debuchy in training (Photo: Arsenal FC via Getty Images) Debuchy hasn't started since November (Photo: Clive Rose) Read More Wenger's brother opens up on Arsenal boss: "The situation is not good for him" 
Wenger leads Arsenal to Sutton after the 5-1 hammering at Bayern in the Champions League last Wednesday. 
And a return for Debuchy would be quite the turn of events, after the French international revealed he and the Gunners boss were barely on speaking terms as he tried to force a January exit. 
Debuchy has played only 16 minutes in the Premier League this term and declared: â€œWhat do I want in the next window? A way out. I want a new challenge, to get back involved, just to do my job well. I miss not having the excitement, the adrenaline." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
